Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages

Class Message

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyAnswer, BuyMessage, ChooseLeadersAnswer, ChooseResourcesAnswer, DisconnectionMessage, EndAnswer, EndGameAnswer, EndTurnAnswer, EndTurnMessage, ErrorAnswer, LeaderActionAnswer, LeaderActionMessage, LeaderMessage, MarketAnswer, MarketMessage, OkLeadersAnswer, OkResourcesAnswer, OtherConnectedAnswer, OtherDisconnectedAnswer, ProduceAnswer, ProductionMessage, ResourceMessage, StartedAnswer, SwapAnswer, SwapMessage, YourTurnAnswer
public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object
This Class represents a Message. The methods in this class return a default value.
